parties.party_name: MICHAEL JOHN MICHAEL JOHN ANTHONY HUTCHINSON

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for term of 63 months as to count 1 and 60 months as to count 2, to be served consecutively. Credit for time served during pretrial detention. Defendant remanded. Court recommends facility capable of evaluating and treating psychological/mental health problems. Supervised release with special conditions for term of 3 years as to counts 1 &; 2, to be served concurrently. Restitution to Thomas G. Tannariello in amount of $950.00. Special Assessment of $100.00. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) and 18:2 FIREARMS (Use of firearm during and in relation to a crime of violence) (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for term of 63 months as to count 1 and 60 months as to count 2, to be served consecutively. Credit for time served during pretrial detention. Defendant remanded. Court recommends facility capable of evaluating and treating psychological/mental health problems. Supervised release with special conditions for term of 3 years as to counts 1 &; 2, to be served concurrently. Restitution to Thomas G. Tannariello in amount of $950.00. Special Assessment of $100.00. (2)

charges.charge_description: Did knowingly take a motor vehicle which had been transported in interstate commerce which in the possession of a firearm in violation of 18 USC 2119 and 924(c) [0:94-m-4149]
